definition: meals (abbr. for 伙食[huo3 shi2])/variant of 夥|伙[huo3]
companion/partner/group/classifier for groups of people/to combine/together

sentences.english: E. g. Most of our accommodation is self-catering.
sentences.chinese: 我们提供的住处大部分是伙食自理的。

sentences.english: Alex's spending on food this month went over budget.
sentences.chinese: 艾力克斯这个月的伙食费超出了预算。

sentences.english: The salesman padded the bill for his travelling expenses by exaggerating his food expenses.
sentences.chinese: 推销员夸大伙食费的开支来虚报出差费。

sentences.english: Now the army meals have improved and are already rather different from having only pickles to eat.
sentences.chinese: 现在部队的伙食改善了，已经比专吃酸菜有所不同了。

sentences.english: We had full kitchens for food. We ate very well.
sentences.chinese: 厨房里满是事物，伙食很好。

sentences.english: The salesman padded the bill for his traveling expenses by exaggerating his food expenses.
sentences.chinese: 那位推销员夸大伙食费用以此浮报差旅费。

sentences.english: The waiter serves only the best food, of course.
sentences.chinese: 当然，酒保只端来最佳的伙食。

sentences.english: Every person spent about 300 yuan a month on food.
sentences.chinese: 每个人每天大约花费300元伙食费。

sentences.english: At university we need at least 300 yuan to cover the board expenses.
sentences.chinese: 在大学我们至少需要300元来支付伙食费。

sentences.english: You can enjoy decent meals with 300 RMB per month.
sentences.chinese: 每生月伙食费300元，可达中等稍上的水平。

sentences.english: During the time of detention the detainee's food costs shall be paid by himself.
sentences.chinese: 在拘留期间，被拘留人的伙食费由自己负担。

sentences.english: The meal plan be20 dollars each for five breakfast and four supper.
sentences.chinese: 伙食费方式是每人20美元，吃五顿早餐和四顿晚餐。

sentences.english: After affair take place, he still compensated 300 dollars to do boarding fee for all of the cow mountains.
sentences.chinese: 事情发生后，他还赔偿了300元给牛山全做伙食费。

sentences.english: Yes. I'd like to reserve two separate rooms with shower and bath, full pension.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我要订两个单间，带淋浴和浴缸，伙食全包。

sentences.english: During a typical meal in space, a meal tray is used to hold the food containers.
sentences.chinese: 太空中典型的伙食是用拖盘盛着食物盒来食用。

definition: to have three meals a day
meal cooked in a large pot/communal meal/(fig.) system that rewards everyone equally regardless of merit
to start providing food/to open today's service in a canteen
dishes with generous amounts of meat and fish/lavish meal
